text: Adventures of a Dentist () is a 1965 Soviet comedy-drama movie directed by Elem Klimov.Путин поздравил народную артистку СССР Веру Васильеву с днем рожденияПОХОЖДЕНИЯ ЗУБНОГО ВРАЧА It stars Andrey Myagkov, Vera Vasilyeva, and Alisa Freindlich. ==Actors== *Andrey Myagkov as Sergey Petrovich Chesnokov *Vera Vasilyeva as Lyudmila Ivanovna Lastochkina *Alisa Freindlich as Masha *Panteleymon Krymov as father of Masha *Olga Gobzeva as Tanya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1965 comedy-drama movies Category:Soviet drama movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Elem Klimov
title: Adventures of a Dentist
